full_description:
Tecnoware FGCEVDP10MM2/D 10 KVA Online UPS

Tecnoware FGCEVDP10MM2/D 10 KVA Online UPS features with On-Line double conversion technology without a transformer (VFI-SS-111), Power Factor 0,9. Here the Rectifier realized by IGBT technology with Active PFC Circuit (0.99). This ups is also Compatible with generators and EPO (Emergency Power Off). The output voltage and frequency can be regulated from the front pane, Static and Manual Bypass. And here used Tecno Manager UPS Management Software. The UPS has 94% High Efficiency calculated in double conversion mode at 100% load, which is according to 62040-3: 2011 standard. This Online UPS also features with SINGLE-PHASE/SINGLE-PHASE 230/230 50/60HZ, POWER 10 KVA, COS 0,9, Online Double Conversion technology without a transformer, DSP System, Multifunction LCD Display, Microprocessor drove battery charge system, STATIC and MANUAL BYPASS, RS232 and USB, TECNOMANAGER Software. This New Online up comes with 01-year warranty.
